duties_responsibilities.duty: Manufacture products using wet lamination or pre-preg lamination techniques.
Interpret and follow manufacturing orders, as well as use pre-preg lamination techniques to cut cloth and lay up products.
Prepare products for vacuum bagging and handle, apply, store, and dispose of composite materials, adhesives, sealants, resins, and solvents.
Inspect finished products for conformance to specifications and complete all required documentation related to assigned jobs.
Follow FOD (foreign object debris prevention) practices and comply with established safety directives and QMS (Quality Management System) procedures.
Maintain a clean work area to ensure adherence to 5S Standards.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent for Layup Fabricator I, with higher levels requiring additional qualifications.
